## processor package

A task processor which could be hooked in.

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [HookDriver](./processor.hookdriver.md) | Provides features like invoking corresponding <code>hook fn</code>s according to <code>hook name</code> in [HookType](./processor.hooktype.md) mode, hooking into children <code>hookd driver</code>, etc. |
|  [Processor](./processor.processor.md) | Used to manage <code>task</code>s. |
|  [Task](./processor.task.md) | A subclass of [HookDriver](./processor.hookdriver.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [TaskOptions](./processor.taskoptions.md) | <code>task options</code> can be seen as a definition of a <code>task</code>. It is used to create <code>task</code> by calling [TaskManager.task()](./processor.taskmanager.task.md)<!-- -->. |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [Context](./processor.context.md) | The context of all <code>task</code>s. |
|  [TaskManager](./processor.taskmanager.md) | Used to manage <code>task</code>s. |

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [parallel](./processor.parallel.md) | Composes the parent <code>task options</code> with children <code>task options</code> in parallel mode. |
|  [series](./processor.series.md) | Composes the parent <code>task options</code> with children <code>task options</code> in series mode. |

## Type Aliases

|  Type Alias | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [BaseHooks](./processor.basehooks.md) | Used to constrain <code>Hooks</code> in [HookDriver](./processor.hookdriver.md) to be a type that all its value are [HookFn](./processor.hookfn.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [HookFn](./processor.hookfn.md) |  |
|  [HookType](./processor.hooktype.md) |  |
